channel.title: Opinions on an idea
channel.description:
My idea would be to implement a "Squeal of Fortune" like RuneScape has, into a private server where you get a daily spin. You would try and get three shapes in a row, diagonally, vertically, or horizontally, like a slot machine, and if you won it would take you to a prize claim page and it would be added into your bank via MySql. You would get one shot a day, and you could 'win' more spins by let's say, playing on the server for half an hour.
Opinions / Thoughts appreciated.

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:16, topic:439359”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=542054.msg3971553#msg3971553 date=1334196453]

Sounds like a cool idea, but how appealing would it look?

I was thinking of doing the whole thing in flash, and just making it write to a database in the end, but i might just use javascript and make the images myself.
[/quote]

You could also just use Java.[/quote]

it’d be easier, yeah. it was just a thought that came to mind, i’ll probably just let this die out.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Cool idea but add even further creativity in it. Don’t do what zyle1992 said and just give out awesome items. Create some new ones or just give out items that will give a little boost. I cannot stand servers where there is an intended economy yet players walk around with a godsword after five minutes of playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

zyle1992:

When you start giving people free Items every day, people lose interest. People with no skill have great items, etc.

They don’t have to be great

Read full topic

@chillwitm888 wrote:

I ARGREE.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Just remember that the less player to player interaction can really bring down your server’s social aspect. This also applies to things such as shops containing high quality items. You want more trading and less “yeah time to do my daily spin and then log off.”

RuneScape has very little socialization at this point, and there’s so much of this shit like the grand exchange, so it works.

but hey that’s like totally my own opinion, homie.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Items wouldn’t be enough to ruin the economy, i’d have a price limit of a certain amount, anything higher won’t appear on the page. I just need something to work on in my spare time, even if it is a mini-project.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Some sort of chance based game where you can win stuff would certainly keep me coming back for more, provided there was enough else on the server to enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Opinions on an idea
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:5, topic:439359”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=542054.msg3971442#msg3971442 date=1334189482]
It wouldn’t be hard to do at all, if that’s what you’re wanting an opinion on.
[/quote]

I know this, i’m wondering if people would like it or not.[/quote]

Judging on how the kids who play R.S.P.S. are now-a-days? They’d flock to it like geese to a mother goose.

Read full topic

Ix Soulcist xI:

I’m sure a server has already made one by now, i’m just curious whether or not if it’s a good idea to work on.
